summary.para: Gets the data content of the timed-text object.

param.name: data
param.para: A pointer to a memory block that receives a pointer to the data content of the timed-text object.

param.name: length
param.para: A pointer to a variable that receives the length in bytes of the data content.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Represents the data content of a timed-text object.
